name: Avoid Traffic
description:
GitHub link: https://github.com/hj2118/AvoidTraffic

This is a top-down view 2D basic action game created using Game Maker Studio 2.

Try to avoid the cars and survive as long as possible! Collect the water bottles for points. You can lie down to avoid cars for a few seconds.

Controls:
Arrow keys: move
Space bar: lie down
